summary: A few Canadian high-schoolers created a free hotline as a means of comforting quarantined seniors across North America. You don't have to be a senior to call in though! Just dial 1-877-JOY-4ALL to hear their list of reguarly updated stories, jokes, and uplifting news! Classic Canadians amirite? ðŸ¤£
